name: The Green Man
description:
A prince from the far off kingdom of Fear and Blood, come to us on his father's dime to slay demons, make friends, find love, and learn about the world and his place in it. Will he fulfill his destiny, or be consumed by frivolous desires? My money is on the latter, personally, but who's to say.

 In the end it doesn't really matter.

I developed The Green Man as a way of getting ideas off my chest. It has a bunch of semi-formed weird experimental aspects in writing, art, and music. In my opinion many of these things are interesting, all I hope is you at least find them funny.
